adverbs.description: pretendingly (comparative more pretendingly, superlative most pretendingly)

examples: The disagreement starts with the species capable of pretend play, which necessarily entails disagreement over what the minds involved do in order to play pretendingly, and when.

entries.meaning: As if by right or title; arrogantly; presumptuously.
examples: I have a particular Reason to look a little pretendingly at present; therefore I hope you will excuse it
